description.@en: You are prone to fits of fatigue, and oftentimes suffer from phantom pains in your muscles. In fact, itâ€™s hard to rouse you from war-weariness without using twice the normal medication required to lift your spirits.

effect.@en: Whenever you use Smelling Salts, you must use two instead of one. Using an additional dose of Smelling Salts in this instance has no negative effects.
